meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kate Brandt Liz Howard Suzanne Koppelman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7798.

td.p: Kate Brandt, a homeschool mom from Carmel, Indiana
Liz Howard, an assistant analyst from McLean, Virginia
Suzanne Koppelman, a museum education manager from New York, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,800)

tr.td: SWITCH TO A COMPETING BRAND
(Alex: There will be a brand item mentioned in the clue. You have to replace that with the appropriate one.)
ON TV
AGRICULTURE
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words of five letters each.)
"FIRE" WORKS
ON THE FOURTH OF JULY
